title: Comfortable 2 BD 2 BA for rent in quiet Lithonia community
posting_body: ['Walden Brook', 'Featured Floorplan: 2-bed / 2-bath / 1157 - 1252 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1753', 'Deposit: Call', 'show contact info', "Description: The living spaces at Gardenwood are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in College Park, GA.", 'Lease Terms: 6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy: A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ All electric', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Extra Storage', '➢ Handrails', '➢ Office', '➢ Range', '➢ Refrigerator/Freezer', '➢ Sprinkler System', '➢ 9 foot ceiling', '➢ Broadband access', "➢ Children's activity center", '➢ Contemporary floor plans', '➢ Deck', '➢ Fully equipped modern kitchens', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Spacious 1, 2 & 3 Bedrooms', '➢ Storage Space', '➢ Upgrade Unit', 'Community Features:', '➢ BBQ/Picnic Area', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Conference Room', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gameroom', '➢ Laundry Facility', '➢ Playground', '➢ Porch', '➢ Resort Style Swimming Pool w/Cabana', '➢ Car Care Center', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Detached garages', '➢ Lake view', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Sundeck', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'Call us:', 'show contact info', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B40AB7ED0D1B4A']
